Title: Othello
Production_Co: BHE Films, National Theatre of Great Britain Production
Cast: Robert Lang, Frank Finlay, Anthony Nicholls, Laurence Olivier, Roy Holder, Derek Jacobi, David Hargreaves, Malcolm Terris, Michael Turner, Kenneth MacKintosh, Harry Lomax, Terence Knapp, Keith Marsh, Tom Kempinski, Nick Edmett
Plot: A general's marriage is destroyed when a vengeful lieutenant convinces him that his new wife has been unfaithful. Desdemona defies her father to marry the Moor of Venice, the mighty warrior, Othello. But Othello's old lieutenant, Iago, doesn't like Othello, and is determined to bring about the downfall of Othello's new favorite, Cassio, and destroy Othello in the process, by casting aspersions on Othello's new bride. Written by Kathy Li
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
Location: Shepperton Studios, Shepperton, Surrey, England, UK
Actors: Laurence Olivier, Frank Finlay, Robert Lang
Description: Directed by Stuart Burge.  With Laurence Olivier, Frank Finlay, Robert Lang, Anthony Nicholls. A general's marriage is destroyed when a vengeful lieutenant convinces him that his new wife has been unfaithful.
